name: Shakir in a hurry
description:
GOAL : COLLECT ALL THE COINS AND KILL EVERY MOB BEFORE TIME IS UP

YOUR GUN SHOOTS RANDOM STUFF BE CAREFUL HOW YOU USE IT

WASD : movement

space : jump

left mouse button : fire

mouse : aim
